mdRecord.dcterms:title: Carte des Ardennes
Nouvelle Carte des Ardennes
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Taride, A.
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 50 x 65 cm., folded in envelope 19 x 14 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Envelope: Nouvelle carte des Ardennes: Avewsnes - Laon - Mezieres - Rethel - Vervins.
Printed price on envelope covered with label reading "Prix: 1 Fr. 25 net." Verso of envelope lists 8 titles, but does not have the listing for "Cartes pour suivre les Opérations Militaires."
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: With original printed envelope, as issued. Used by Frederick L. Brown, 2nd Lieut., Signal Corps, Meteorological Division, with his signature and map identification "No D."
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: World War, 1914-1918--France--Maps.
World War, 1914-1918--France--Ardennes--Maps.
Ardennes (France)--Maps.
